title: SRK thanks 'Ittefaq' team for recreating his favourite film
text:
Superstar Shah Rukh Khan visited the set of " Ittefaq " on the first day of shooting and thanked the team for recreating his favourite Yash Chopra movie. 

The 51-year-old took to Twitter to share a picture from the set along with the lead actors of the film - Sonakshi Sinha and Sidharth Malhotra . 'Ittefaq' starts now. Thanx to Juno and his wonderful team. My fav films by Yashji #Ittefaq is being recreated by Abhay. Thx @S1dharthM @sonakshisinha Akshaye. Also BR & Dharma Films tie up with RCE," he tweeted. Directed by filmmaker BR Chopra's grandson Abhay, the movie is a remake of 1969 film of the same name which starred yesteryear superstar Rajesh Khanna and Nanda . My fav films by Yashji #Ittefaq is being recreated by Abhay. Thx @S1dharthM @sonakshisinha Akshaye. Also BR & Dharma Films tie up with RCE

Sidharth and Sonakshi thanked SRK for supporting their movie. "Thank u for coming on set @iamsrk excited to recreate the magic," Sidharth wrote. "Thank YOU @iamsrk, @karanjohar and of #BRFilms... was an amazing first day on set today with you all! Great start to our #Ittefaq journey!," Sonakshi tweeted. 
Sidharth Malhotra says he's not under pressure to reprise Rajesh Khanna's role in 'Ittefaq' remake Actor Sidharth Malhotra, who will be seen stepping in the shoes of superstar late Rajesh Khanna for the remake of 'Ittefaq', says he is not under pressure. 
The movie is produced by Dharma Productions and Red Chillies Entertainment. 
Sonakshi-Sidharth's 'Ittefaq' remake to hit the floor in Feb 00:55
